div.p: This value set does not contain a fixed number of concepts

Situation codes describing the reason that a procedure, which might otherwise be expected, was not performed, or a procedure that was started was not completed. Consists of SNOMED CT codes, children of procedure contraindicated (183932001), procedure discontinued (416406003), procedure not done (416237000), procedure not indicated (428119001), procedure not offered (416064006), procedure not wanted (416432009), procedure refused (183944003), and procedure stopped (394908001).

Copyright Statement: This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright © 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement
This value set includes codes defined in other code systems, using the following rules:

ul.li: Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 183932001
Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 416406003
Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 416237000
Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 428119001
Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 416064006
Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 416432009
Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 183944003
Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 394908001

publisher.value: Health Level Seven, Inc. - CQI WG

description.value: Situation codes describing the reason that a procedure, which might otherwise be expected, was not performed, or a procedure that was started was not completed. Consists of SNOMED CT codes, children of procedure contraindicated (183932001), procedure discontinued (416406003), procedure not done (416237000), procedure not indicated (428119001), procedure not offered (416064006), procedure not wanted (416432009), procedure refused (183944003), and procedure stopped (394908001).
